h1: How Many Calories in 1 Teaspoon of Sugar?
assumptions: Granulated white sugar, level teaspoon (≈4 g), no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, packing density, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of granulated sugar provides about 16 calories, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 teaspoon of sugar?

faqs.a: Yes, 1 teaspoon is 4 g of carbohydrates, all as sugars, with no protein or fat.

faqs.q: How does brown sugar compare to white?
faqs.a: Brown sugar has about 17 kcal per teaspoon due to added molasses.

faqs.q: Does sugar have any fiber or sodium?
faqs.a: No fiber or sodium; it's pure sucrose.

faqs.q: What if I use a rounded teaspoon?
faqs.a: A heaping teaspoon adds about 4 more calories, totaling 20 kcal.
